Module com.example.addressbook
Package com.example.addressbook.SQL

Interface IUserDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
SqliteUserDAO
public interface IUserDAO
Interface for the User Data Access Object that handles the CRUD operations for the User class with the database.

  • Method Details

    • addUser

      void addUser(User user)
      Adds a new user to the database.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to add.

    • deleteUser

      void deleteUser(User user)
      Deletes a user from the database.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to delete.

    • getUser

      User getUser(int id)
      Retrieves a user from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the contact to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The user with the given id, or null if not found.

    • getUserByEmail

      User getUserByEmail(String email)
      Retrieves a user from the database by email.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the contact to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The user with the given email, or null if not found.

    • updateUser

      void updateUser(User user, String newPassword)
      Updates a user in the database.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to update.
      newPassword - The new password

    • setCustomNotification

      void setCustomNotification(int userId, String notification) throws SQLException
      Updates a users custom notification in the database.
      Parameters:
      userId - The id of the user
      notification - The custom notification
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs
